snippet: Mike Muscala scored 6 of his 20 points in a decisive second-half stretch to help host Bucknell capture an N.C.A.A. tournament berth with a 64-56 win over Lafayette.
abstract: Bucknell defeats Lafayette, 64-55, to clinch NCAA tournament berth; other men's college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Muscala scored 6 of his 20 points in a decisive second-half stretch to help host Bucknell capture an N.C.A.A. tournament berth with a 64-56 win over Lafayette.
